summary: A unit‑test suite that verifies the functionality of a debug‑printing utility, checking ordered and staged output, formatting options, argument donation, handling of complex data structures, numpy print settings, default layout, named format strings, multiple prints, eager execution mode, and static argument support.
business_intent: Provide confidence that the debug‑print feature works correctly across diverse scenarios, enabling developers to rely on accurate and configurable diagnostic output during development and debugging.
